sensory_systems.name: Advanced Computer Vision Systems (ACVS)
sensory_systems.description: Multi-camera systems employing deep learning for real-time threat detection, anomaly detection, and forensic analysis. Incorporates thermal imaging, multispectral imaging, and 3D reconstruction for enhanced situational awareness. Capable of identifying and classifying objects, people, and behaviors in dynamic environments.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Object detection accuracy: 95%+, Person detection accuracy: 90%+, Anomaly detection false positive rate: <2%, 3D reconstruction error: <1cm

sensory_systems.name: Acoustic Threat Detection Systems
sensory_systems.description: AI-powered systems analyzing audio data for gunshot detection, suspicious noises, and unusual patterns. Utilizes microphone arrays and advanced signal processing for precise localization and classification.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Gunshot detection range: 50m, False positive rate: <1%, Localization accuracy: <2m

sensory_systems.name: Sensor Fusion Platforms
sensory_systems.description: Real-time data integration from multiple sensors (ACVS, acoustic, vibration, environmental) via standardized communication protocols. Uses Kalman filtering and Bayesian networks for optimal data interpretation and predictive analytics.

sensory_systems.name: Network Intrusion Detection Systems (NIDS) – Autonomous
sensory_systems.description: NIDS enhanced with AI to proactively identify and respond to emerging threats by analyzing network traffic patterns in real-time.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Threat detection accuracy: 97%, False Positive Rate: <0.5%

control_systems.name: Robotic Response Units (RRUs)
control_systems.description: Mobile robots equipped with manipulators, sensors, and communication capabilities for physical intervention, evidence collection, and system access.  Capable of navigating complex environments and executing pre-defined tasks autonomously.
control_systems.specifications: Payload capacity: 10-20 kg, Operational range: 50m, Dexterity: 6 Degrees of Freedom (DOF)

control_systems.name: Drone Swarms – Security Applications
control_systems.description: Coordinated groups of drones utilized for surveillance, perimeter security, and rapid response to incidents.  Includes autonomous navigation, cooperative control, and payload delivery capabilities.
control_systems.specifications: Flight endurance: 60 minutes, Payload capacity: 2kg, Communication range: 5km

control_systems.name: Cyber-Physical System (CPS) Control Interface
control_systems.description: A standardized, secure interface allowing direct control of physical security systems (access control, CCTV, locks) from the automated response platform.
control_systems.specifications: Communication protocol: Secure CAN or similar, Latency: <5ms

mechanical_systems.name: Modular Robotic Arms
mechanical_systems.description: Reconfigurable robotic arms with interchangeable end-effectors for diverse tasks (evidence handling, door manipulation, system access). Utilizing force sensors and tactile feedback for precise control.
mechanical_systems.specifications: Payload capacity: 5-10 kg, Operational range: 3m, Degrees of Freedom: 7 DOF

mechanical_systems.name: Smart Locks and Access Control Systems – Autonomous Override
mechanical_systems.description: Access control systems integrated with robotic control, allowing for remote lock manipulation and authorized entry/exit.
mechanical_systems.specifications: Locking mechanism: Electronic or mechanical, Security Level: AES-256 or higher

mechanical_systems.name: Miniaturized Intervention Tools
mechanical_systems.description: Small, highly dexterous tools for physical intervention, capable of operating in confined spaces.

software_integration.name: AI Orchestration Platform (AOP)
software_integration.description: Centralized platform integrating and managing all automated security processes, including threat detection, response planning, and post-incident analysis. Utilizes machine learning for adaptive response and continuous improvement.
software_integration.technology_level: Currently in development, refinement needed: 3-7 years

software_integration.name: Digital Twins – Security Environments
software_integration.description: Virtual representations of physical security environments, allowing for simulation, testing, and predictive analysis. Used for training and optimizing automated responses.

software_integration.name: Blockchain-Based Audit Trails
software_integration.description: Immutable record of all security events and actions, ensuring accountability and facilitating forensic investigations.
